modName: Mixed Armor ANIMEISH NOT LORE FRIENDLY NO IMMERSION
summary: a piece of armor I made for my char from various mods from oblivion
descriptionHtml:
***THIS IS NOT LORE FRIENDLY! THIS ARMOR IS MADE TO MY OWN PERSONAL TASTES, IF YOU DO NOT LIKE IT FEEL FREE TO WALK AWAY AND LEAVE***

***this does not include the head used in the images, nor the headdress because I could not find copyright info on them. sorry but please stop asking***

update4: fixed some naming problems in the nif files.

update3: ive done a very poor skin fix, now her skin color will match your face color. However because I simply mapped the UV to a location on the texture that has nothing there will be no textures on her skin but at least it will be better than that bright color...

update2: ive given up on redoing the uv map for the skin, waaay beyond my skill level

update1: hopefully ive fixed the crashes caused by the 1stperson meshes, let me know if you still crash using the new file.

the very first armor i converted from oblivion. female only, replaces dragonscale armor set minus the helmet, does not include the head used in the images, nor the headdress because I could not find copyright info on them.

to install extract the data folder inside the .rar into your skyrim folder

gauntlets/boots: tona\'s whitesquall armor
gloves/socks: hepsy\'s gothppo
corset: R18PN\'s amy set
boot sections: hentai\'s hernisch and serenity armor
other parts: Aridale

note the skin textures does not change regardless of your char/race, and it is probably quite bright for a vanilla skyrim.

the first person hands have some clipping, and the fingers arent rigged so fingers dont move (they move with the hands)

the armor is super skinny because i like skinny girls and i pretty much made everything skinnier, there are no weight sliders, so if you like big girls this probably isnt for u.

theres a problem that very rarely when you equip the armor piece your game will crash but ive no idea whats causing it.

theres prolly a lotta bug on this but this is my first ever armor mod so any tips r appreciated.

I originally made this out of random pieces I had in my oblivion folder so I\'m rly sorry if you made anything in this armor and I didn\'t mention you, or I\'m not supposed to release your stuff (but im pretty sure i got every1)

permission:
do whatever

credits:
exnem for the original eyecandy body in oblivion
RAIAR for the HGEC body
R18PN
tona
hepsy
hentai
Aridale

PS. lots of requests to fix the skin color, hands, and crashes.
the skin color i would like to fix but i would need to learn how to texture stuff from scratch, i donno anything about texturing, the crashes i would also like to fix but have no clue whats wrong with it, and the hands, im probably not going to bother until I fix the other 2 problems. If any1 wanna help/gimme tips that\'d be nice.
author: me
